menu.name: Kaiser Roll
menu.description: Large and round, crisp on the outside, and soft on the inside, they have a five-point pinwheel design on top, which is meant to represent a crown.

menu.name: Seeds Roll
menu.description: Small rolls, rather not for making sandwiches, but as an accompaniment to anything.

menu.name: Ciabatta Roll
menu.description: Ciabatta is the Italian word for “slipper”, and this Italian-made bread made entirely of just a few basic ingredients, including water, salt, yeast, and wheat flour.

menu.name: Rye 5 Grains Loaf
menu.description: The Multi-Grain Sourdough contains 50% rye flour and 50% wheat flour. Sprinkled with 5 different grains and seeds giving it a flavoursome and hearty taste.

menu.name: Sauerkraut Loaf
menu.description: Sauerkraut Bread takes a little twist on a classic Amish sauerkraut bread recipe. A hearty, moist bread with a slightly sweet flavor, crusty outside.

menu.name: Farmhouse Loaf
menu.description: Rustic bread made with 50% whole rye flour and 50% wheat flour. Our carefully raised sourdough cultures give this bread its distinctive and hearty, artisan texture and flavour.

menu.name: Blueberry Danish
menu.description: Flaky puff pastry dough topped with a cream cheese mixture and fresh blueberries. It’s simply delicious!

menu.name: Chocolate Torsade
menu.description: Flaky pastries filled with creamy vanilla custard and chocolate chips. These chocolate custard puff pastry treats are perfect for your next breakfast or mid-afternoon treat.

menu.name: Croissant
menu.description: Flaky, buttery, delicious croissant. Try it.

menu.name: Milk
menu.description: Local fresh milk straight from the farm to our shelves. 3 per pack.

menu.name: Cider
menu.description: Locally brewed, subtle apple flavor. 3 per pack.

menu.name: Water
menu.description: Collected from the Kraspik fountain in the nearby mountain. 4 per pack.
